= Introduction =
Well this is one simple example, taken from my other project uoogle
(Google search API)


<html>
        <head>

                <title>Google AJAX API Search</title>

                <script type="text/javascript" src="resources/js/yaguajax.js"></script>

                <script type="text/javascript">

                        function loadSearch (term) {

                                var elm  = document.getElementById('_search');
                                elm.innerHTML = '';

                                var yagu = new yaguajax();
                                yagu.target('_search');
                                yagu.addVar('term',term.value);

                                yagu.simpleRequest('results.php','POST');

                        }

                </script>

        </head>

        <body>

                <form action="results.php" method="GET">
                        <input type="text" name="q">
                        <input type="submit" value="Go">
                </form>

                <div id="_search"></div>

        </body>

</html>
